testcase.name: When User click on MyAccount
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment
testcase.system-out: Background: # Features/AssignmentTestEnvironment.feature:4 Given User is on Retail website # LoginTestStepDefinition.user_is_on_Retail_website()

testcase.name: When If Register option is displayed User click on Register
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And User should see Register Account form
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And User should see Your Personal Details section with fields: 'First Name', 'Last Name', 'E-Mail','Telephone'
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And User should see Your Password section: 'Password' and 'Password Confirm'
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: Then User fill out Register form with information below
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And Verify 'Newsletter' section present
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And Verify 'No' Radio button is selected by default
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: Then User selects 'Yes' to subscribe
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And Verify 'Continue' button is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And Verify check box 'I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy' next to 'Continue' button

testcase.name: Then Click on check box
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: Then Click on 'Continue' button
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment

testcase.name: And Text should be displayed 'Your Account Has Been Created!'
testcase.classname: Scenario: A) Register account for Test Environment
